en.pressContinue: Press the next button to continue.
en.opening_0: Hello there, welcome to the Garden Family! Here, we will breed animals and grow some plants.
en.opening_1: It's really hard for me to do this all alone, so I will need your help!
en.opening_2: Here are some animals & plants to take care of the garden.
en.firstdeer_0: What you need to do is give them what they need. Easy, right?
en.firstdeer_1: Wait until the animals and the plants show what they need.
en.firstdeer_2: And then, just drag the item in the box below to the designated animal/plant.
en.firstdeer_3: All the items that you need are prepared in the box!
en.firstdeernext_1: But don't work slow, or else the animals will run, or worse -- the plants will die!
en.firstdeernext_2: Trash cards and unneeded cards: put it into the red recycle bin to make spaces for new cards!
en.firstgrow_1: Just like the other animals, goats will grow if they live long enough while consuming sufficient foods.
en.firstgrow_2: Thank you for giving them what they need. Keep up the good work!
en.firstdeergrowdifferentstructure_0: At some point, animals will grow while having changes in their body structure.
en.firstdeergrowdifferentstructure_1: Just as you can see in this goat, it has undergone several different feature changes.
en.firstdeergrowdifferentstructure_2: I'm very curious to see how big animals can grow!
en.firstplant_0: Hey, I bought a new plant! You'll have to take care of it differently from animals, though.
en.firstplant_1: Just like other living organism, it will also grow if they live long enough.
en.firstplant_2: Take good care of it and soon we'll see how it grows!
en.firstduck_0: Look at these little ducks. Aren't they cute?
en.firstduck_1: Fun fact: they grow differently from goats! Ducks come from an egg, while goats are born directly from its mother.
en.firstduck_2: Let's take care of them and see how they grow later!
en.firstplantgrow_0: Do you want to know more about plants?
en.firstplantgrow_1: Plants grow differently from animals. Do you know what are the differences?
en.firstplantgrow_2: First of all, it started as a seed,
en.firstplantgrow_3: After it got enough minerals from soil and water, it will become a sprout.
en.firstplantgrow_4: If they live long enough, they will grow bigger! Each plant grows differently, but usually they will have roots, stems, leaves and sometimes fruit.
en.deergrowfinalstructure_0: It's reaching its adult state. Look at how brave it is!
en.deergrowfinalstructure_1: Beside different looks, it has also grown on the inside. Look at the growth of its bone.
en.deergrowfinalstructure_2: It is larger than before, that's why some of their body parts are getting larger, too.
en.deergrowfinalstructure_3: Great job so far. Let's find out more about animal growth!
en.finalgame_0: Time sure flies when we worked hard, huh?
en.finalgame_1: Itâ€™s the last 30 seconds for us!
en.finalgame_2: Good luck and wish you all the best!
en.finalgameend_0: Finally, that's it! It has been very fun taking care all of this together with you.
en.finalgameend_1: But now it's time to say goodbye.
en.finalgameend_2: I hope you learned a lot while playing this game with me. You did a great job!
en.finalgameend_3: Thanks for helping me out, and let's play again sometime!
